# KOSMOS

Koordinations-, Optimierungs- und Simulations-Software fÃ¼r Modulare Quanten-Systeme in 6G Netzwerken

## Prerequisites

- Python >= 3.13 (on Windows, Python 3.13 is recommended due to wheel availability)

## Installation

### Install from PyPI

```sh
pip install kosmos-core
```

## Documentation and Examples

You can find the API documentation and examples at [docs.6gqt.mobile.ifi.lmu.de](https://docs.6gqt.mobile.ifi.lmu.de).
